resources.string: Radio Zamaneh is a mobile RSS news reader with enhanced security features, offline reading and sharing capability.
The stories shared with you using Radio Zamaneh Nearby are listed here.
Tap the panic button to delete your personal data within Radio Zamaneh. You can set the panic action to delete the entire app in your preferences.
Share stories, feeds and the entire app using the Radio Zamaneh Secure Share. It\'s safe, easy and only requires a friend nearby with Bluetooth. App sharing requires a WiFi network or hotspot.

Tips to reduce your data consumption:

1. Sync only the feeds that matter to you most. Radio Zamaneh allows you to sync individual feeds.

2. Choose Bit Wise syncing mode in your preferences. This syncs only text, with the ability to load photos on a story by story basis.

3. Expire your articles in a timely manner. Choose your time frame in your preferences.

Since 2007, Radio Zamaneh has focused particularly on increasing public awareness on democracy and human rights in Iran. We strive for an informed, educated and empowered civil society that can act as a catalyst for change and reform and put an end to increasing violations of basic human rights in Iran.
Software licenses and more information available online at: https://guardianproject.info/apps/

Radio Zamaneh provides a feed of noteworthy news to its community. Every post created with Radio Zamaneh will undergo a curation process before it is shared in the official Radio Zamaneh news feed. Please see the Terms & Conditions ("About Radio Zamaneh" then "Terms & Software Licenses) to understand the rights you grant when you share information with Radio Zamaneh.
